name: Parking:
info: Self-parking in the underground garage is ￡15 per day and valet-parking is ￡50 per day.

name: Airport Shuttle:
info: Our complimentary airport shuttles leave every hour on the hour, and make trips to Heathrow and Gatwick airports.

name: Trains:
info: The nearest Underground station is at Leicester Square.

name: Pet Policy:
info: Pets of all sizes and types are allowed in designated pet rooms, and the specified common areas. Service animals are allowed everywhere.
